review: I love my apple products.. They are easy to use for people who aren't technically savvy. Well worth the price to stream my Netflix and Amazon Prime. I highly recommend this for anyone. This also comes with the Apple guarantee which is one of the best parts of apple if not the best. Their genius bar is always there to help!

review: I would give this 5 stars if Apple would include a web browser and the ability to open up the app store.  Otherwise it is awesome!  We use it every day between the loaded apps, and mirroring content.  You can also connect it to your home network and watch/view any content on that network.  its the bee's knees!
